titleStmt.title: A defence of the right of kings Wherein the power of the papacie ouer princes, is refuted; and the Oath of Allegeance iustified. Written for the vse of all English romanists; more especially, for the information of those priests, or Iesuits, which are by proclamation commanded to conforme themselues, or depart the kingdome. By Edvvard Forset, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Forset, Edward, 1553?-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Pyed Bull, neere Saint Austens Gate,

notesStmt.note: A belated answer to two items by Robert Parsons, STC 19408 and STC 19417.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Pyed Bull, neere Saint Austens Gate
